channel.title: Need Help With Bot Spaming Problem On my Server
channel.description: lately, some kids have been using some client to logg in hundreds of bots, and crash the server. i need to figure out how to fix the problem, so if anyone can help, it would be much appreciated!

item.title: Need Help With Bot Spaming Problem On my Server
item.dc:creator: @xxxxxx_13 xxxxxx 13
item.description:
@xxxxxx_13 wrote:

The thing i have found to help the most is an ipfilter. You can find plenty of copy and paste tutorials on various websites including this one. However the good ones i cant link you to because they are on another site. But what you need is an ip filter. it only allows so many connections before it just starts rejecting. Blocking names doesnâ€™t really work because if someone uses an allgofree spammer. They can change the name.

Read full topic
item.source: Need Help With Bot Spaming Problem On my Server
